title: How to prepare for GMAT at home and which books to prefer - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Anonymous. I have written a well detailed answer on how to self study : Aditya Misra's answer to How do I start studying for the GMAT without joining any coaching institutions? Also please refer to this link : Aditya Misra's answer to Which book is the best for GMAT preaparation without going for any course? This answer contains all the links to your major questions. Hope they help you. Cheers!
